name: Live Comment Notification Toaster
author: biztechc

sections.description:
Live comment notification plugin can enable the admin to install a live notification toaster to notify all online customers whenever any comment is made by any online customer.

  1. We can have live notification toaster if any user will comment on any content of blog.
  2. Comment moderation must be off to work this plugin well.
  3. If moderation is on then we can have only notification from registered user’s comments.
  4. We can select post type for which we want this notification to work.
  5. We can have multiple comments if comments are posted on multiple posts.
  6. This plugin tracks IP of posted comment and according to it,gives notification.
  7. There is setting in admin,if they want notification open for all users OR only authors.
  8. If they select only authors,then if any comment posted on logged in user’s article,then they will receive notification.
sections.installation:
1. Copy the entire /live-comment-notification/ directory into your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin.
  3. Change settings from plugin settings tab and make plugin active.
sections.faq: 1.Is this plugin prepared for multisites? – Yes.
